sentences.en: As soon as they arrived in the town they went out to explore.
sentences.cn: 他们一到这城镇就外出察看周围环境.

sentences.en: Boys at that age should be able to explore and go off on their own, go on bike rides, get into mischief.
sentences.cn: 那个年龄的男孩应该可以自己出去闯，也可以骑车出游，还可以调皮捣蛋。

sentences.en: Central to the operation is a mile-deep well, dug originally to explore for oil.
sentences.cn: 那次行动的重点是一口深达1英里的井，最初钻那口井是为了勘探石油。

sentences.en: Children use fantasy to explore worrying aspects of real life.
sentences.cn: 孩子们用幻想来探索实际生活中令人不安的各种事情。
向西或到什么别的地方去勘探.

sentences.en: I admire those explorers who ventured forth to explore new lands.
sentences.cn: 我敬佩那些为发现新大陆而外出的探险家们.

sentences.en: I just wanted to explore Paris, read Sartre, listen to Sidney Bechet.
sentences.cn: 我就想逛逛巴黎，读读萨特的作品，听听悉尼·贝谢的音乐。

sentences.en: I want to explore and get in touch with my inner self.
sentences.cn: 我想认真探寻、了解内心的自我。

sentences.en: I would creep in and with stealthy footsteps explore the second-floor.
sentences.cn: 我会偷偷溜进去，轻手轻脚地查看一下二楼。

sentences.en: I’m going to explore the possibility of a part-time job.
sentences.cn: 我要好好想想兼职工作的可能性。

sentences.en: Management need to explore ways of improving office security.
sentences.cn: 管理层需要探讨如何加强办事处的安全措施。

sentences.en: The secretary is expected to explore ideas for post-war reconstruction of the area.
sentences.cn: 部长预计将会探讨这个地区战后重建的意见。

sentences.en: The two hotel-restaurants are attractive bases from which to explore southeast Tuscany.
sentences.cn: 对于去托斯卡纳东南部探险的人们来说，这两家酒店是很有吸引力的驻扎地。

sentences.en: This chapter will explore the statutory and constitutional implications of these restrictions.
sentences.cn: 本章将探索这些限制的法令和宪法含义.

sentences.en: Venice is a wonderful city to explore.
sentences.cn: 威尼斯是一个美妙的城市，值得好好探究一番。

sentences.en: Watching your child explore the world about her can open your eyes to delights long forgotten.
sentences.cn: 看着孩子探索她身边的世界能让你体会到早已忘记的快乐。

sentences.en: We must explore all the possibilities.
sentences.cn: 我们必须探讨所有的可能性.

sentences.en: You can hire a car if you want to explore further afield.
sentences.cn: 如果你还想逛更远的地方,可以租辆车.

trans.tran_en: to discuss or think about something carefully
to discuss or think about something carefully
to discuss or think about something carefully
